trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que processa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>evento é originado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A>método antes de adicionar um controlo a uma zona de peças Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: Este evento fornece uma oportunidade para cancelar o processo antes de terminar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>evento for chamado depois de um controlo foi adicionado a uma zona de peças Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartAddingEventHandler delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O método especificado no delegado WebPartAddingEventHandler é chamado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores de página podem fornecer processadores personalizados para o evento adicionando o `OnWebPartAdding` atributo para o `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento na página e atribuir um nome de método personalizado para o atributo.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser atribuído um processador personalizado através de programação.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a atribuição de forma programática um processador de eventos, consulte [NIB: como: ligar métodos de processador de eventos para eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
